marklogic.body:
Are you kidding? Â The modern Right is a bunch of non-stop whiners.
These sites are nothing but a bunch of oversensitive crybabies and misinformed dummies griping about what Bill Maher said about them or what mean thing was said about Sarah Palin. Â
Breitbart sites are mostly babies crying like little girls about what perceived slight has been are to their cherished beliefs. Â
The people on this board should try growingÂ some balls and Act like men but they're not happy unless they've got something to bitch about.
Most Brietbart commenters totally have a Victim Mentality. Â
The rest are just Crying babies.
